scripts.generate:v2: ts-node scripts/generate-test-services.ts v2 && yarn lint:fix && yarn --frozen-lockfile

scripts.generate:openapi: ts-node scripts/generate-test-services.ts openapi && yarn lint:fix && yarn --frozen-lockfile
